about_the_game:
NOTE TO OUR GAMER FRIENDS: THE ART PRESENTED IS PROTOTYPE QUALITY ONLY! WE ARE RAPIDLY WORKING TOWARDS IMPROVING THE ART SO THAT THE GAME LOOKS PRETTIER.




The sun is blotted out by an eclipse. The world is thrust into darkness and is dying. The masses pray to Solara, the sun god, for the return of the sun. But Solara's First Paladin Ember discovers the horrifying secret: Solara has stolen the sun for herself. Ember is spurred into action, embarking on a quest into heaven to take back the light. As she sets out to vanquish Solara, she will confront formidable foes while journeying through a mystical realm and meet some allies along the way who share her goal of restoring the sun.

KEY FEATURES


A Unique Combat System: Eclipse Breaker features a mix of real time and turn-based combat system. You can move around in real time, but attacking and defending happens in turns. We are enthusiasts of games that feature either of these styles of combat and wanted to create a turn-based combat game enjoyable for those who favor real-time combat experiences.

Multiple Heroes: Recruit new party members who share your goal of restoring light to the world. Only a chosen few are capable of seeing the mission through till the end. Select among multiple characters who have unique abilities that suit your style.

Intense Bosses: Solara is defended by the Elementals, powerful demons that do her bidding and protect her realm. Fight through an army of fallen angels and redeemed demons will stand in your way and attempt to thwart your progress.

Unique Power Ups and Builds: Each Elemental wields an arcane power. Every time you defeat one, you attain their power and become stronger. As you accumulate more power-ups, you'll unlock the ability to craft diverse builds.
